projects.title: Fresh Family Photo
projects.bodyText:
- Photography Job Platform Single Page App made in React
 -  Users can create job posts as a Job Poster or Apply as a Photographer.
 - Dynamic user interface and functionality based on user type.

projects.title: InsightInk -  Journaling App
projects.bodyText:
- A Dynamic Journaling web app made using **Django** to suit **Anyone's** journaling needs. People can create multiple journal, multiple entries per journal, and view entries displayed dynamically based on the template chosen.
 - Collaborated with team member from start to finish.
 - Deployed on **heroku** using **gunicorn**.

projects.title: Food Inventory
projects.bodyText:
- A Full Stack App that aids users in tracking their **food inventory** at home.
 - Multiple tracking properties, sorting functionality, and expiration tracking to aid the user in keeping their food inventory fresh, organized, and full.

projects.title: Blackjack App
projects.bodyText:
- A Desktop Blackjack App.
 - Double Down, Dealer Messaging, Wagering, and Buy back-in Features.
 - Created Using Vanilla Javascript.

projects.title: MVVM Sample App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads data from mock API and show in both **LinearLayout** and **GridLayout RecyclerView**.
 - Offline support using **Room** DB and **NetworkBoundResource**.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.

projects.title: Feed List App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads list of feeds from a **paginated** API and shows in a RecyclerView.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.
 - Uses **Paging 3** library along with other Architecture Components.

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **Angular 12**.
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.

projects.title: Image Encryption/Decryption
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App for Image Encryption and Decryption made in **Django**.
 - Uses **SDES** algorithm for encryption/decryption.
